title: suport lead gehirn  ,  please help me  , im khaissosweeeeeet  , only u can help me  ,
body:
gehirn  i'm khaissosweeeeeet   do u rememebr me ,  last time u help me to be unbanner  ,   

 this time   i got perma ban again ,  i made a lot ticket  they are same to last time ,  they are just say :  we never change ur acc ,  good luck in ur new game ,,

i just want know  what about ur answer ,  u are my last hope ,

(2 mounth ago my acc got ban )

i can't sleep  , because its unfair ,

if u can be fair ,  iwill mute everyone whenever im playing game ,  please ,  i just want u be fair ,  i can't let my acc gone again again and again ,  

last time u banning   , i never get any claimant   ,  this time  i just want u guys be fair ,  please




your in-game comms extremely inflammatory and offensive , your account's been permanently suspended

---------------

first : i said "i will show u real feeding" because  my teammates aways call me feeding int , they said  report this mid , they are never do anything,  they are just blaming me , when enemy team jg gank me for no stop  ,  im try my best to play the game ,  but my jg walking around ,  wheni  need she help me   she just walk away ,  she just try to making me angry and report me  ,  can u check last game   my teammates talks,  please,  u will be see the real comms extremely inflammatory and offensive  ,

 u perma banned  for comms extremely inflammatory and offensive  ,  but   can u check my chats ,  im aways answer my teammates question ,  they are try to making me angry  they are comms extremely inflammatory and offensive   ,,

after game  they report me ,  they said :  u talk to much  , u said magic word  waiting for ban  u fucking asian ,


now i got ban ,


-------------


suport lead gehirn   can you help me ,   i made ticket like 30 times ,      i played lol 5 years  i never get anyban in my own server , i paid 3150aus$ in my acc ,   i have nearly full skin ,     do u remember me  , im khaissosweeeeeet   first time  the system banned me for im botting  for i used Third-party plug-in 。
but  i didn't  ,  supporter from ticket they said  :" because someone reporting me for botting  so they never do anything to my acc ”



now  same ,  they answer me aways :  our system banning u 9 times  so  we never change ur acc again , ,   its same to last time ,  only u tried best to help me before ,  i dont know what should i do , 

im diamond3 when i get ban  ,

now im plat2  ,

i was try to forgort this thing , but i can't  , because i played 5years , 

its so fucking unfair ,

can u watching this  video .
                                                     https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VjzgbZL12VI&t=97s

 




thankyou                              ------ write to suport lead gehirn
